DbDetails.DbTable: xbs.hd_service_contract_header h left join xbs.payment_term p on h.payment_term_id=p.payment_term_id left join xbs.ar_customer a on h.ar_customer_id=a.ar_customer_id left join xbs.ar_customer_site a0 on h.ar_customer_site_id=a0.ar_customer_site_id left join xbs.currency c on h.doc_currency=c.currency_id left join xbs.address a1 on h.ship_to_id=a1.address_id left join xbs.address a2 on h.bill_to_id=a2.address_id left join xbs.currency c0 on h.currency=c0.currency_id left join xbs.option_line o on h.approval_status=o.option_line_id left join xbs.gl_currency_conversion g on h.exchange_rate_type=g.gl_currency_conversion_id left join xbs.uom u on h.duration_uom_id=u.uom_id
DbDetails.Data: h.contract_number,h.category,p.payment_term payment_term_id,a.customer_name ar_customer_id,a0.customer_site_name ar_customer_site_id,c.title doc_currency,a1.address ship_to_id,a2.address bill_to_id,c0.title currency,h.exchange_rate,o.option_line_value approval_status,h.bu_org_id,h.header_amount,h.tax_amount,g.currency_conversion_type exchange_rate_type,h.hd_service_contract_header_id,h.version,h.start_date,h.end_date,h.duration,u.uom_name duration_uom_id,h.document_owner,h.receipt_amount,h.negotiation_status,h.status,h.document_number,h.document_date,h.billing_cb,h.invoicing_rule,h.accounting_rule,h.renewal_process,h.renew_upto_date,h.rewnew_pricing_method,h.rewnew_price_list_id,h.sales_person_employee_id,h.description,h.created_by,h.creation_date,h.last_update_by,h.last_update_date
